summary:
I have been working for Halliburton for over 35 years mainly in the Well Production Enhancement arena and retired in 2016.  However, I am still interested in activities related to stimulating the production of oil and gas wells and welcome any opportunity to do get involved in such activities.

I can be reached at +31653372225 or by sending an e-mail to eurogoat@planet.nl or nico.vangijtenbeek@gmail.com
